title: Squid and carabineros prawns with bomba rice and alioli
description: An impressive Spanish dish to rustle up at your next dinner party. Use large raw prawns with the shell on if you can’t get hold of carabineros.
ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, for drizzling
1 litre/1¾ pints crab or shellfish stock
handful flat leaf parsley, finely chopped
4 raw jumbo carabineros prawns, heads removed and used for stock
2 medium squid, prepared and cleaned (ask your fishmonger to do this)
